definition: Ludwig Boltzmann (1844-1906), Austrian physicist and philosopher

sentences.english: Using a simple method, this paper established a Boltzmann relation on entropy.
sentences.chinese: 本文用一種簡單的方法建立了熵的玻爾茲曼關係式。

sentences.english: Energy distribution of electron calculated follows approximately Boltzmann distribution.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，電子能量近似服從玻爾茲曼分佈。

sentences.english: This is called the Boltzmann equation.
